comments.author: Stefan Guggisberg
comments.body:
fixed in svn r478892

the new implementation tries to reconnect and re-execute the failing stmt after a SQLException had been encountered.

targeted for 1.2 since this is a rather big change.

although preliminary tests were successful a lot more testing is needed, especially with different backends.

summary: DatabasePersistenceManager & DatabaseFileSystem: try to gracefully recover from connection loss
